ProcessPlanner class

class process_planner.ProcessPlanner(initial_path_problem, initial_process_state=None)

Bases: object

Acts as an interface for handling events. Keeps track of the building process with the ProcessState class and provides robot commands. Handles calculation of new solutions in case of a detour event.

Parameters

  • initial_path_problem¶ (PathProblem) – See PathProblem.

  • initial_process_state¶ (Optional [PathProblem]) – Optional parameter if an initial process state exists.

Variables

  • _initial_path_problem – A copy of the original path problem

  • optimal_solution – A solution to the initial path problem.

  • next_recommended_action – The next recommended worker action according to the process planner

handle_motion_event(motion_event, handle_detour_events=True, ignore_part_check=False, ignore_empty_stock=False, ignore_obstructions=False)

Main method of ProcessPlanner. Takes worker_event as input and sends information about the event to ProcessState. Prints message output of ProcessState and handles detour events.

Parameters

  • motion_event¶ (MotionEvent) – A tuple containing event position and event code. Contains a part ID instead of a position in case of a pick event.

  • handle_detour_events¶ (bool) – If set to true, detour events will result in the process planner looking for a new solution.

  • ignore_part_check¶ (bool) – If set to true, part restrictions will be ignored. Could lead to unexpected behaviour.

  • ignore_obstructions¶ (bool) – If set to true, obstructions will be ignored. Could lead to unexpected behaviour.

  • ignore_empty_stock¶ (bool) – If set to true, parts with empty stock can be picked without error. Could lead to unexpected behaviour.

Returns

ProcessOutput containing processed information regarding the event and current process state.

handle_detour_trails(process_state)

Handles current detour trails and decides if the currently aimed solution should return to a previous iteration.

Parameters

process_state¶ (ProcessState) – The current process state.

Returns

An optional str message if the currently aimed solution was changed to a previous one.

handle_detour_event(detour_event, process_state)

Handles the detour event, applies new solution if found.

Parameters

  • process_state¶ (ProcessState) – The current process state.

  • detour_event¶ (BuildingInstructions) – Dictionary containing a trail and building instruction of the deviated layout.

Returns

A tuple containing str messages and a modified state with the new solution applied (tuple [str, ProcessState]).

static determine_fastening_robot_commands(event_pos, event_code, event_info)

Reads the current process state and determines command codes for the fastening robot.

Parameters

  • event_pos¶ (Pos) – See parameter event_pos

  • event_code¶ (int) – See parameter event_code

  • event_info¶ (AssemblyEventResult) – See AssemblyEventResult

Returns

tuple containing robot command codes for the fastening robot (See Fastening Robot Command Codes).

static determine_picking_robot_commands(event_code, process_state, layout=None)

Reads the current process state and determines command codes for the picking robot.

Parameters

  • process_state¶ (ProcessState) – The current process state.

  • event_code¶ (int) – See parameter event_code

  • layout¶ (Trail) – The current layout.

Returns

tuple containing robot command codes for the picking robot (See Picking Robot Command Codes).

return_to_previous_state()

Restores the previous state as the current state.
